actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment

official_title: To amend title VI of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to establish a 1-year program to stimulate the economy by providing additional funding for the State water pollution control revolving fund program, and for other purposes.
subjects: Federal aid to water pollution control
Federal aid to water resources development

summary.text: Lowey-DeLauro Emergency Infrastructure Jobs Act - Amends the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to direct the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to make capitalization grants to each State during FY 1993 for an economic stimulus program administered through such State's water pollution control revolving fund program. Authorizes appropriations. Authorizes supplemental appropriations to the Secretary of Agriculture for FY 1993 for grants to States, Indian tribes, and nonprofit entities and agencies for soil conservation and water resources and waste facilities development purposes as specified under the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act. Reserves part of such authorized funds for related technical assistance and training grants.

titles.title: To amend title VI of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to establish a 1-year program to stimulate the economy by providing additional funding for the State water pollution control revolving fund program, and for other purposes.
